6. Conscious dogs: This refers to dogs that are awake and alert during the study.
7. Prolonged oral administration: This refers to the study of the effects of dronedarone or amiodarone when taken by mouth for an extended period of time.
8. Sympathetic stimulation: This refers to the study of the effects of stimulating the sympathetic nervous system, which is a part of the autonomic nervous system that plays a key role in the body's "fight or flight" response.
